Config.SqlBefore: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE xtype='U' AND Name='s_mhjjParam') DROP TABLE s_mhjjParam select ID,NAME INTO s_mhjjParam FROM mhjjParam WHERE ID IN (24,25)
Config.SqlAfter:
delete from kfAccess where [Level]=2 and IsGroup=1 and ID not in (select ParentID from kfAccess)
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE xtype='U' AND Name='s_mhjjParam') BEGIN UPDATE mhjjParam SET Name=s_mhjjParam.Name FROM mhjjParam INNER JOIN s_mhjjParam ON mhjjParam.ID=s_mhjjParam.ID DROP TABLE s_mhjjParam END
